definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Look, the moving van is backing into their driveway.
sentences.chinese: 你看，運傢俱的大卡車正在往他們家的車道上倒車呢。

sentences.english: Traffic was streaming down the grade, mostly big trucks in the righthand lane.
sentences.chinese: 下坡的路上車流如潮，大卡車大都行駛在右車道上。

sentences.english: The lumberjacks carry the logs in their big truck.
sentences.chinese: 伐木工人用大卡車來運送木材。

sentences.english: The bridge vibrated when a heavy truck passed .
sentences.chinese: 當重型大卡車經過時，這個橋架就會震動。

sentences.english: The big truck stopped at the filling station and gassed up.
sentences.chinese: 大卡車在加油站停下來灌油。

sentences.english: The next morning, a big truck comes.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早晨，來了一輛大卡車。

sentences.english: Your economy car is so safe now that you'll survive an accident with a larger vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 現在經濟性轎車即使與大卡車相撞都能保你平安生還。

sentences.english: Red Cross succeed to enter 2 large trucks of food in Sirte.
sentences.chinese: 紅十字會樂成向蘇爾特送入2大卡車食品。

sentences.english: The initial weight loss on the 800-kcal diet was an average of 11.0 kg.
sentences.chinese: 800大卡飲食階段平均體重減輕約11公斤。

sentences.english: The calorie is the unit usually used for measuring the amount of energy transfer in biochemistry .
sentences.chinese: 生物化學中測定能量轉移量的單位是大卡。

sentences.english: An ounce of sugar has about 100 calor ies.
sentences.chinese: 一盎司的糖含約100大卡的熱量。

sentences.english: You will consume an average of 187 fewer calories if you do.
sentences.chinese: 如果這樣做，你平均可以少喫187大卡熱量。

sentences.english: Recently I begin to become very much interested in Da Capo games.
sentences.chinese: 最近，我開始變得非常的大卡波遊戲感興趣。

sentences.english: The entire house vibrates when a big truck goes by.
sentences.chinese: 大卡車從旁經過時整個房子都顫動。

sentences.english: "Those 100-calories packs retrain people to the eye and decrease thesnacking, " Jampolis said.
sentences.chinese: 那些100大卡裝的零食能減少人們的零食慾。

sentences.english: Truck on the road to Chenggong.
sentences.chinese: 在呈貢的路上的大卡車。

definition: fat (in the body, in a plant, or in food)
to absorb (nutrients etc)/to assimilate/intake/to take a photograph of (a scene)
catty/(PRC) weight equal to 500 g/(Tw) weight equal to 600 g/(HK, Malaysia, Singapore) slightly over 604 g
